mains.item: Roasted Turkey with Connecticut Spice Rub
mains.description: A traditional turkey gets a twist with a spice rub made from local ingredients like bay leaf, allspice, and cayenne pepper.
A savory ham glazed with local apple cider for added sweetness.

sides.description: Local maple syrup adds a touch of sweetness to this classic side dish.

sides.item: Green Bean Casserole with Bacon and Mushrooms
sides.description: A Connecticut favorite, this version includes bacon from nearby farms and wild mushrooms foraged in the state's forests.

sides.item: Sweet Potato Casserole with Marshmallow Topping and Candied Pecans
sides.description: This dish combines traditional sweet potato casserole with a Connecticut twist – candied pecans, which are often used in local baked goods.
A classic stuffing is given a Connecticut touch with the addition of fresh oysters from Long Island Sound. The cornbread base can be made using local cornmeal.

desserts.item: Pumpkin Pie with Bourbon Whipped Cream
desserts.description: This classic dessert gets a Connecticut touch with the addition of local bourbon from a distillery in the state.
Connecticut apples are used for this dish, topped with a crispy oat topping and served with locally made ice cream.

mains.description: Traditional turkey brined in Connecticut apple cider, roasted to a golden crisp and infused with subtle hints of apple and cinnamon.
Juicy ham glazed with local Connecticut maple syrup, accented with brown sugar and fresh rosemary.

sides.description: Classic New England stuffing made with crusty bread, local sausage, and tart cranberries for a perfect balance of savory and sweet.
A creamy casserole with roasted butternut squash, sweet corn, and a hint of nutmeg, inspired by Connecticut's seasonal harvest.

sides.item: Garlic Mashed Potatoes with Herb Butter
sides.description: Smooth, fluffy potatoes whipped with roasted garlic and topped with herb-infused butter for a rich, aromatic side.
A creamy chowder filled with tender clams, potatoes, and celery, a nod to Connecticut’s rich coastal flavors.

desserts.description: Warm, spiced bread pudding made with apple cider donuts and drizzled with a caramel sauce, combining a New England classic with a Thanksgiving twist.
